channel.title: CVE Feed for Franklin Fueling System -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Franklin Fueling System -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5846|2024-09-12T13:35:16.629Z -- franklin%20fueling%20system -- ts-550
item.description: Franklin Fueling System TS-550 versions prior to 1.9.23.8960 are vulnerable to attackers decoding admin credentials, resulting in unauthenticated access to the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-2442|2024-03-19T16:28:24.518Z -- franklin%20fueling%20system -- evo%20550
item.description: Franklin Fueling System EVO 550 and EVO 5000 are vulnerable to a Path Traversal vulnerability that could allow an attacker to access sensitive files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-2442|2024-08-01T19:11:53.519Z -- franklin%20fueling%20system -- evo%20550
item.description: Franklin Fueling System EVO 550 and EVO 5000 are vulnerable to a Path Traversal vulnerability that could allow an attacker to access sensitive files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-2442|2024-08-28T14:43:58.384Z -- franklin%20fueling%20system -- evo%20550
item.description: Franklin Fueling System EVO 550 and EVO 5000 are vulnerable to a Path Traversal vulnerability that could allow an attacker to access sensitive files on the system.
